content: As you can see the javac compiler doesn't strip any (public) variable name from the .class file. As a result the names of the functions, their parameters and types of return are exposed. (This is necessary in order for other classes to access them.)
stemmed: As see javac compil n't strip ( public ) variabl name .class file . As result name function , paramet type return expos . ( thi necessari order class access . )
